text: Someone to Watch Over Me is a 1987 American British romantic crime thriller movie directed by Ridley Scott and starring Tom Berenger, Mimi Rogers, Lorraine Bracco, Jerry Orbach, John Rubinstein, Mark Moses, Tracey Childs, Daniel Hugh Kelly. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1987 crime thriller movies Category:1987 romance movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American romantic thriller movies Category:British crime thriller movies Category:British romance movies Category:Movies directed by Ridley Scott Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies about murderers Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Someone to Watch Over Me
